inputs.name: Email addresses
inputs.help_text: Enter email addresses separated by semicolon.

inputs.name: Email Schedule
inputs.help_text: Select the interval to generate and send report email notifications.

inputs.name: Generate Full Report
inputs.help_text: Check this box to generate and send a complete report every time.

actions.description: Saves the current email notification settings.
Resets the email notification settings to their default values.
Tests the email notification configuration by sending a test email.

constraints.constraint: Email addresses must be valid and separated by semicolons.
Email Schedule must be one of the predefined options: daily, weekly, or monthly.

errors.trigger: When an email address is not properly formatted.
When no schedule is chosen from the dropdown.

steps: Navigate to System > Configuration > Notification > Email Notification.
Choose 'Use emails from General Settings' or 'Custom' and enter email addresses.
Select the interval for email notifications (daily, weekly, or monthly).
Optionally, check 'Generate Full Report' to send a complete report every time.
Click 'Save Changes' to apply the settings.
